## Services Offered

### Washing Machine Repair
Complete washing machine repair for top-load, front-load, and fully automatic models. We fix spinning issues, drainage problems, drum noise, vibration, water leakage, and door locking problems.

### Refrigerator Repair & Service
Fast and reliable fridge repair for single-door, double-door, and side-by-side models. We fix cooling issues, freezer problems, water leakage, strange noises, ice buildup, and thermostat issues.

### Microwave Repair & Service
Expert microwave oven repair. We fix heating issues, turntable rotation, sparking, control panel problems, door issues, and strange smells.

### Dryer Repair & Service
Professional clothes dryer repair services. We fix heating issues, drum spinning, drying delays, unusual noises, overheating, and starting problems.

### Dishwasher Repair & Service
Expert dishwasher repair for all brands. We fix cleaning issues, drainage problems, starting issues, water leakage, odors, and spray arm problems.
